## Question #3  
#3a.
```{r}
queue <- c('sheep', 'fox', 'owl', 'ant')
queue <- c(queue, 'serpent')
print(queue)
```
# 3b
```{r}
queue <- queue[-1]
print(queue)
```
# 3c 
```{r}
queue <- c('Donkey', queue[1:4])
print(queue)
```
# 3d
```{r}
queue <- queue[-5]
print(queue)
```
# 3e
```{r}
queue <- append(queue, "aphid", after=3)
print(queue)
```
# 3f
```{r}
aphid_location<-which(queue=="aphid")
print(aphid_location)
```
